name: Solar Takeover
description:
Host and join games like Among Us!

Use quick thinking and clicking to best your opponents.

Early Alpha (Game requires restart after every match, multiplayer is very hard)

Controls: Left-click planets to select them, left and right-click another to send all or half troops respectively, and drag-click to continuously send all troops to another planet. (alt-f4 to close or ctrl+shift+esc to open task manager to close, escape + quit game button miiight work)

To-do List: Fix bugs (lots), optimize menu system (new buttons and main menu), much bigger maps (10x scale at least), sound, stats page, custom skins
